##Setting up our Environment

First things first: we set up our environment to include all the packages and libraries needed for analysis.


```{r}
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
library(googleVis)
op <- options(gvis.plot.tag='chart')
library(survey)
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
detach("package:plyr", unload=TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape)
library(plotrix)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

```{r,results='asis',tidy=FALSE}

source("lib/jmd2228_functions.R")

had_child_t_test(population)
had_child_bar_chart(population)
childs_parents_nativity()
```
